website_summaries.verdict: A premium option that dries hands in 12 sec. or less.
pros: Equipped with a high-speed motor capable of delivering up to 25,000 rpm
Stainless steel housing is stylish and versatile
cons: Can be difficult to find replacement parts

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this item for a customer and it did not work. Now we are stuck with a product that doesn't work and an angry customer. The power was verified on the unit but there is no heat or blowing, I tried to contact the seller with no results.
customer_reviews.author: GL W.

customer_reviews.title: Work so well we are buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. They are very pretty and do a great job! We plan to buy more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got installed 4 of them in the building and they seems to be working reliably and well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This hand dryer works really well. It is a good hand dryer!
customer_reviews.author: ngan s.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product !!! We use in our ball fields , great product !!! Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Robin McAllister

customer_reviews.title: These are some really good hand dryers
customer_reviews.text: These are some really good hand dryers. They work exactly as advertised! They are very efficient as well. Would definitely recommend to buy these for any type of business!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Good

customer_reviews.title: Employees love the heat feature.
customer_reviews.text: Good volume of air and here in Colorado, the employees love the heating feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price good hand dryers
customer_reviews.text: Good price good machines. Save papers and times. My customers are very satisfied. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nina nina

customer_reviews.title: Good hand dryers
customer_reviews.text: Very very good deal. Save a lot of paper and money. Will buy again for my an other salon
customer_reviews.author: Hong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Feels like Xlerators to me
customer_reviews.text: For less than a hundred bucks apiece, vs $400+ for Xlerators, I wasn't expecting much. But guess what? They seem to blow as hard as the pricier option! Feels like Xlerators to me! Now let's hope they continue to work for a long while in our restaurant. Even if they only last a few years, I'll be happy & buy them as replacements again!
customer_reviews.author: N. Do

customer_reviews.title: Better than TCBunny
customer_reviews.text: I like these much better than the TCBunny ones I replaced. These have a better sensor and they actually emit a light onto the hands so you know you're in the sensor range.
customer_reviews.author: Just Call Ben

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, decided to use plug for now, will eventually have an electrician hard wire. Love the look. Adds decor to church restrooms. Worth the $$ for long term use, don't go cheap at church!
customer_reviews.author: iPad user

customer_reviews.title: No issues and continue to get great comments about them
customer_reviews.text: I have only had them in operation for two weeks but they are solid so far. No issues and continue to get great comments about them.
customer_reviews.author: W & T

customer_reviews.title: Blown away! Affordable and Met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the purchase of these hand dryers. I especially like that the light triggers the dryer to turn on. It's nice that your hands don't have to touch a button to turn it on, which helps with sanitation.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: These dryers are designed to last just about the warranty expires. I bought three but after a while they won’t shutdown. I contacted the company looking for support and their answer was Thakn you for your message. We just noticed your order was placed over two years ago, sorry that we could not cover it anymore as our warranty is one year. Sorry that the hand dryer has been defective due to the long period time of use. You could try to repair it in the local repair shop by replacing the internal damaged part, but you'd better replace the hand dryers with new ones. Sorry about this. Don’t waste your money on these products.
customer_reviews.author: 3 defective products

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fast shipping, very powerful dryer with nice chrome finish. Very good price. Recommended.A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hand dryer. Excellent seller. Excellent shipping. Will buy again. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: trangdinh

product_meta.title: AjAir (2 Pack Heavy Duty Commercial 1800 Watts High Speed Automatic Hot Hand Dryer - Stainless Steel (Stainless Steel)
product_meta.description: AjAir Hand Dryers. Dry hands within 10-12 seconds, faster than low power, like 1200 watts, 800 watts Lower energy consumption than old models and no using paper towels any more, LED light to assist with troubleshooting. Maximum draw of 4.5 amps allows for multiple units can be installed on one circuit, which significantly reduces the time and costs of installation. Housing is made with heavy-duty, one-piece die cast zinc alloy that is rust-proof and unbreakable. added strength and durability. White Thermoset (BMC) cover. Includes hardware for surface mounting. 5/8 HP motor offers 20,000 RPM with an air velocity of 16,000 LFM 110/120V, 4.2-4.6 Amp and . Infrared optical sensor activated. Measures 11-3/4W x 6-11/16D x 12-11/16H. UL,approved.
